data.text: Matɔxɔɛ mu lanma muxu tan bɛ,
Muxu Marigi Ala na koore ma,
Kɔnɔ e xa kuyee yailanxi xɛɛma nun gbeti nan na,
Dɛ na e bɛ, kɔnɔ e mu wɔyɛnma,
tuli na e bɛ, kɔnɔ e mu xui mɛma,
Bɛlɛxɛ na e bɛ, kɔnɔ e mu se masuxuma,
E yailanmae fama nɛ lude alɔ e tan.
Isirayila bɔnsɔɛ, i xaxili ti Alatala ra,
Haruna bɔnsɔɛ, i xaxili ti Alatala ra,
Wo tan naxee findixi Ala yaragaaxuie ra,
Marigi a ɲɔxɔ saxi won xɔn ma.
Alatala xa wo tan nun wo xa die yiriwa.
Alatala naxan koore nun bɔxi daa,
Mixi faxaxie xa mu Alatala matɔxɔma,
kɔnɔ won tan naxee na duniɲa,
